test.name: ftp
test.label: FTP Test
test.description: Verify that the specified FTP server is functioning properly.
test.longDescription: Phone configuration files produced by the @sipxecs.name@ Configuration Server can optionally be served by an FTP server. This test verifies that the specified FTP server can be used to retrieve a special phone configuration test file which has been produced by the Configuration Server.

result.description: The FTP server did not respond to the connection request.

result.msg: FTP server address could not be resolved.
result.description: The specified FTP server address could not be resolved to an IP address. Verify that the DNS server(s) have a valid entry.
The resolved IP address of the specified FTP server did not respond to ICMP pings. Verify that the server is running and reachable from this network.
The test client has suffered an unrecoverable network failure. Please see the details for further information.

result.msg: FTP get of test file failed.
result.description: The specified FTP server failed to serve the test configuration file. Verify that the FTP server is running and properly configured.

result.msg: FTP test file did not verify.
result.description: The test file that was retrieved from the specified FTP server was found to be corrupted. Please contact technical support for further assistance.
